title: Opinion on novel coronavirus COVID-19 as a health issue India 2020
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Staying alert and taking precautions and lowest at Response Don't know much about coronavirus.
The lowest value at Response Don't know much about coronavirus is 24.0x times less than the highest value at Staying alert and taking precautions.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Response Staying alert and taking precautions has the highest Share of respondents and Don't know much about coronavirus has the lowest Share of respondents.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Staying alert and taking precautions and lowest at Response Don't know much about coronavirus.
The lowest value at Response Don't know much about coronavirus is 24.0x times less than the highest value at Staying alert and taking precautions.
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 72.0 is found at Response Staying alert and taking precautions and the minimum is found at Don't know much about coronavirus where Response is 3.0.
The highest Response Staying alert and taking precautions has 69.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Don't know much about coronavirus.
Share of respondents at Response Staying alert and taking precautions is 72.0 , second place is Don't believe it can impact us or Indians at large at 16.0, and thirdly is Can't say at 6.0.
Response Don't know much about coronavirus, and Don't believe it can impact us have a similar Share of respondents that is 3.0.
The Response Don't know much about coronavirus tends to be 3.6 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Responses, we get total 100.0.

data.Response: Don't believe it can impact us or Indians at large
Don't believe it can impact us
